page.title: 07White leaf golf club,W.leaf.
page.content: Whiteleaf golf club is situated in Whiteleaf Village on the scopes of the Chiltern Hills. It's a very picturesque course with magnificent views the vale of Aylesbury and the surrounding area. It is a private club which covers more tha 60 acres of land. The trees and slopes provide natrual hazards on the course, together with the sand bunkers it is an unusual course in that there are only 9 holes,each hole is played twice to make 18 holes.The course has a par of 66. a public foot-path runs over part of the course,it runs from the Monks Risborough Cricket Ground across the course and comes out near the Plough Public House at Cadsden. There is a club house and a club professional.There is a full membership and a waiting list.
